模块 uk.ac.soton.comp1206
程序包 uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene

类 BaseScene

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.BaseScene
直接已知子类:
ChallengeScene, InstructionsScene, LobbyScene, MenuScene, ScoresScene
public abstract class BaseScene extends Object
A Base Scene used in the game. Handles common functionality between all scenes.
